headline: Is Waste Management’s Dividend Hike And Buyback Shifting The Investment Case For WM?
summary: Waste Management recently boosted its quarterly dividend by 14.5% and authorized a new US$3.00 billion share repurchase program, while Wall Street expects higher earnings and revenue, particularly from its renewable energy segment. These moves highlight how the company is pairing landfill and recycling scale with growing renewable energy operations to enhance its cash‑generation profile. With shares gaining around 3.6% over the past week, we’ll examine how this dividend hike and buyback...

headline: Assessing Waste Management (WM) Valuation After Recent Share Price Momentum
summary: Why Waste Management is on investors’ radar Waste Management (WM) has attracted fresh attention after recent share performance, with the stock near US$229.23 and positive returns over the past month and past 3 months prompting investors to reassess its current valuation.
